question:
[Morgan] and her father, [Kevin], went to the marina. [Kevin]'s daughter, [Valerie], had purchased a boat, and they were eager to see it. [Morgan] attended the graduation of her sister's son [Scott]. [Kenneth] and his son, [Darryl], went to the supermarket. [Robert], [Kenneth]'s son, had asked them to bring him back some cookies. [Darryl] and his sister, [Brittney], went to a sneak preview of the Avengers movie and loved it. [Debra] called her son, [Brian], and told him there was a problem. She was suddenly busy, and he needed to come pick his son [Scott] up as soon as possible. [Valerie] and her son [Darryl] made hot dogs. [Darryl]'s brother [Robert] ate one.
Question: How is [Brittney] related to [Debra]?

Step 3: Determine the relationship between [Brittney] and [Debra]:
- [Brittney] is [Darryl]'s sister, and [Darryl] is [Valerie]'s son.

- Therefore, [Brittney] is [Morgan]'s niece.

Based on the information provided, [Brittney] is [Debra]'s granddaughter.
